resources.string: Here are the rules of TicTacToe: One player is angels, and the second player is demons. Take turns playing in a grid cell until one player has 3 of their icons in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. If nobody wins, the game ends in a tie, at which point a new game can - and should - be started. Game on!
Uh oh! The game has ended in a draw!
